title: Restore mix

properties.value: Restore mix can be made by members with level 24 Herblore by adding roe or caviar to a two-dose restore potion, giving 21 Herblore experience. This mix can only be created after completing the Herblore part of Barbarian training with Otto Godblessed. It is the highest level barbarian potion that can be made using roe. When drinking a sip of the potion the game states You drink the lumpy potion.. If the player drinks all doses or empties the potion, it will become a regular empty vial.

SMW Subobject for (1)High Alchemy value: 26Buy limit: 2000Examine: One dose of fishy restore potion.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Restore mixImage: File:Restore mix(1).pngUses infobox: ItemWeight: 0.045Value: 44Version anchor: 1 doseRelease date: 3 July 2007Item ID: 11451

Restore mix can be made by members with level 24 Herblore by adding roe or caviar to a two-dose restore potion, giving 21 Herblore experience. This mix can only be created after completing the Herblore part of Barbarian training with Otto Godblessed. It is the highest level barbarian potion that can be made using roe. When drinking a sip of the potion the game states You drink the lumpy potion.. If the player drinks all doses or empties the potion, it will become a regular empty vial.

Uses[edit | edit source]

This potion restores Attack, Strength, Defence, Ranged and Magic when the level in one of these skills has been temporarily reduced. Each dose restores each stat by 10 + 30% of the user's level in that skill (minimum of 10 points at level 1-3 and maximum of 39 points at level 97-99), up to the player's level in that skill. It will also heal the player for 3 Hitpoints.

This potion does not restore Prayer points, unlike this potion's super counterpart.

'''Restore mix''' can be made by [[members]] with level 24 [[Herblore]] by adding [[roe]] or [[caviar]] to a two-dose [[restore potion]], giving 21 [[Herblore]] [[experience]]. This mix can only be created after completing the Herblore part of [[Barbarian training]] with [[Otto Godblessed]]. It is the highest level barbarian potion that can be made using roe. When drinking a sip of the potion the game states ''You drink the lumpy potion.''. If the player drinks all doses or empties the potion, it will become a regular empty [[vial]].

==Uses==
This potion restores [[Attack]], [[Strength]], [[Defence]], [[Ranged]] and [[Magic]] when the level in one of these skills has been temporarily reduced. Each dose restores each stat by 10 + 30% of the user's level in that skill (minimum of 10 points at level 1-3 and maximum of 39 points at level 97-99), up to the player's level in that skill. It will also heal the player for 3 Hitpoints.

This potion does '''not''' restore [[Prayer]] points, unlike this potion's [[Super restore mix|super counterpart]].
